articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Lebanese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Lebanese President
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Michel Suleiman, President of Lebanon, on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger day by day and sincerely wished the president greater success in his work for the political stability, national unity, peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Maritime Supervision Burea Delegation Leaves for Britain
articles.content:
Maritime Supervision Burea Delegation Leaves for Britain
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Maritime Supervision Bureau led by its Director Ko Nung Du left here by air on Saturday to attend the 26th general assembly of the International Maritime Organization to be held in Britain.

articles.title: Guideline for Popularizing Physical Culture and Sports
articles.content:
Guideline for Popularizing Physical Culture and Sports
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung made public the famous work "Let Us Develop Physical Culture and Sports on a Mass Basis and Prepare All the People for Labor and Defence" in November Juche 58 (1969).
					 The President in the work clarified the position and importance of the physical culture and sports and put forth the tasks to develop the sports work into an all-people movement.
					
					 He noted that it is an important issue of deciding on the rise and fall of a country to develop sports activities extensively and make all the people strong, stressing that it is imperative to improve the physical strength of the people as a whole for accelerating the socialist construction and for strengthening national defence.
					
					 He also underlined that the schools, all the organs, enterprises, cooperative farms and families should organize sports activities and increase physical strength of the people.
					
					 In the past period, the Korean people have made proud successes in all fields of sports including popular sports and athletes exalted the honor of the country in international tournaments.
					
					 Many mass sports events are organized annually including the National Sports Contest of Workers, the National Folk Sports Contest of Agricultural Workers, the Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions and the National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize through which the strong will and noble spirit of collectivism are displayed to the full and the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of making sports mass-based and an inseparable part of life demonstrated clearly.
					
					 The Kim Il Sung Stadium, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Ice Rink, sports gymnasiums in Chongchun Street and other well-arranged sports facilities have been built across the country and stadiums, gymnasiums, swimming pools and others constructed in provinces, cities and counties so that working people and school youth and children are taking an active part in the physical culture and sports activities.
					
					 The mass sports activities will make a positive contribution to preparing all the Korean people for labor and defence and to developing the sports technique of the country.

articles.title: Japanese Suppression of Korean Independence Movement
articles.content:
Japanese Suppression of Korean Independence Movement
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists committed an unprecedented crime by brutally cracking down upon the anti-Japanese independence movement of the Korean people in an attempt to exterminate them.
					 When the anti-Japanese sentiments of the Korean people were mounting higher after the concoction of the "Ulsa Five-Point Treaty" in 1905, they fabricated various evil laws for maintaining and strengthening their colonial rule and covered the whole Korea with a network of army, gendarme and police and thus crushed any slightest elements of the  independence movement in a brutal way.
					
					 They concocted the "Korean Civil Act", "Korean Criminal Act", "Korean Lash Act", "Korean Prison Act" and other evil laws and put the "Criminal Summary Act" into force, letting the gendarme and police punish the patriotic people at random.
					
					 They, crying that the "punitive" operation against the anti-Japanese righteous volunteers could not be carried out only with the armed forces present in Korea, shipped huge forces into Korea from the Japan proper.
					
					The repression of the volunteers' struggle was at its height after August 1907.
					
					 According to the drastically curtailed data released by the Japanese imperialists, they killed more than 3,620 volunteers and people between August and December 1907 and over 11,560 in 1908.
					
					 Typical of  "punitive" operations was the "encirclement and annihilation operation" to suppress the volunteers in the area of Jolla Province at that time.
					
					 In November 1910 they launched large-scale "punitive operations" against the anti-Japanese righteous volunteer units to slay lots of volunteers and patriotic people right and left in the areas of Hwanghae, Hamgyong and Kyongsang provinces. They fabricated an "attempted assassination of Terauchi" in December that year. With this as an occasion, they arrested over 600 Korean patriots, threw over 100 persons into prison and punished most of them.
					
					 The number of the patriots who were arrested and imprisoned by them by exercising the "right to forced execution" and the "right to summary punishment" grew over 10 times in 1918 that in 1912.
					
					The Korean people will certainly make the Japanese imperialists pay for their brutal suppression of the anti-Japanese independence movement and massacre of Korean people no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Koreans in the north and the south and overseas are keenly aware of the bitter lesson and truth taught by the history of the nation that unity leads to victory and split to ruin. They are now waging a dynamic struggle, regarding the idea of "By our nation itself" as the maxim of the times as it encourages them to usher in a new era of independent reunification and national prosperity. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said idea serves as a great ideological and moral source encouraging all Koreans to turn out in the patriotic cause of reunification full of conviction of victory.
					
					 The above-said idea reflects the firm will of all the Koreans to advance in firm unity irrespective of ideology, system, religious belief and political view, cherishing the idea of national self-determination that issues of a nation should be settled by its concerted efforts, the Koreans' awareness and pride of advantages of the nation and the true consciousness of being members of the nation. 
					
					 The said idea helps the members of the nation give fullest play to the spirit of independence and the might of unity and thus encourages them to bitterly hate foreign forces infringing upon the dignity and interests of the Korean nation and turn out in the dynamic struggle for independent national reunification against flunkeyism and dependence upon foreign forces. 
					
					 The last nearly decade since the said idea was advanced witnessed the consciousness of national independence growing stronger among Koreans at home and abroad and the desire for independent reunification getting more ardent despite the manifold ordeals and hardships caused by the anti-reunification acts and confrontation moves of the reactionaries inside and outside south Korea. These facts clearly prove that the above-said idea serves as a true banner of patriotism and national reunification and the cause of reunification which the Koreans strive hard to accomplish in the spirit of "By our nation itself" is entirely just. 
					
					 The above-said idea serves as a source of patriotism defusing the distrust and confrontation imposed by foreign forces upon the Koreans and as an engine encouraging them to build on this land a reunified power to be envied by all other people of the world by their concerted efforts and demonstrate the might of the Korean nation all over the world, concludes the article.

articles.title: Bellicose Forces' Reckless Arms Buildup under Fire
articles.content:
Bellicose Forces' Reckless Arms Buildup under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The bellicose forces of the south Korean military are getting evermore frantic in their moves to beef up their armed forces against the DPRK.
					 The warlike forces are now putting spurs to the restructuring of their overall armed forces, the development of ultra-modern combat equipment and the shipment of arms and equipment from abroad, crying out for acquiring the "capability for independently carrying out a war."
					
					 On October 13 last they disclosed that they would build six new type destroyers to be used as a main force of the naval task unit. 
					
					 Earlier, the ground force drew up a plan to develop tactical drones capable of monitoring the DPRK round-the-clock and air relay drones and deploy them at each army corps and infantry division.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that they are getting more zealous in their efforts to beef up the armed forces for conducting landing operations.
					
					 It is one of their scenarios to deploy more new type armored vehicles for landing operations and mobile helicopters, etc. at the marine corps for the purpose of expanding the sphere of their attack into the depth of the enemy side. 
					
					 In another development, the warmongers of the south Korean military are massively shipping war hardware into south Korea from abroad for invading the north.
					
					 According to information about arms sale overseas disclosed by an institution under the U.S. Department of Defense, south Korea purchased U.S.-made weapons worth 716,600,000 U.S. dollars this year alone.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove how desperately the bellicose forces of south Korea are working to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost.

articles.title: S. Korean Bellicose Forces' Military Provocation Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Bellicose Forces' Military Provocation Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement on Nov. 14 denounced the south Korean warlike forces for committing reckless armed provocation in the waters under the control of the north side in the West Sea of Korea, driving the situation to a crisis.
					 The south Korean authorities which hamstrung every effort for detente on the Korean Peninsula finally perpetrated the armed provocation in the West Sea of Korea, pushing the situation to a very grave phase, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The "northern limit line" is an illegal bogus line unilaterally drawn by the U.S. However, the south side opened fire at a naval patrol boat of the north side, talking about its "trespassing" on the line. This was an intolerable military provocation.
					
					 The statement recalled that after the occurrence of the incident different circles described it as a "conflict produced by the U.S. pressure on the north and the government's hard-line policy" and the public was of the view that such incident would not have happened if the October 4 declaration had been implemented.
					
					 If the authorities refuse to opt for implementing the declaration, it will entail catastrophic consequences, the statement warned, saying that all people would intensify the actions critical of the authorities' confrontation moves and demanding the implementation of the south-north declarations.

articles.title: Anniversary of International Kothongryon Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of International Kothongryon Marked
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- A function marking the 20th anniversary of the formation of the International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) was held in Moscow on Nov. 18.
					 Present there were Sok Myong Son, chairman of the confederation, Jo Yun Hae, chairperson of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, chairmen and representatives of the United Confederations of Koreans in Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan, other compatriots and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and officials of his embassy in Moscow.
					
					 The participants first placed a floral basket before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then followed a meeting to commemorate the anniversary.
					
					 A congratulatory speech was made there by the DPRK ambassador to Russia.
					
					 Introduced then were congratulatory messages sent by the Committee for Overseas Koreans of the DPRK and several overseas Koreans' organizations.
					
					 Sok Myong Son in a report said that over the past 20 years since its formation the confederation has grown to be an organization representing the Koreans residing in the CIS region and has unswervingly followed the path of worthwhile struggle under the care of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 He called for more vigorously conducting the patriotic movement for reunification and activities helpful to the prosperity of the country under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted there.
					
					 An appeal to the overseas Koreans all over the world was made public there. It said that national reunification is a pressing issue the solution of which brooks no further delay, stressing the need for all Koreans to pool their strength and wisdom and turn out in the struggle to accelerate the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea irrespective of political view and religious belief.
					
					 There took place on the same day a photo exhibition, a performance of Korean artistes and a reception.
					
					 The participants appreciated Korean film "The Country I Saw" (Parts 2 and 3).

articles.title: Peruvian Group release bulletin
articles.content:
Peruvian Group release bulletin
 Pyongyang, November 21 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism released a bulletin entitled "Stop provocations to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" on Nov. 12.
					 The bulletin in an article gave a detailed account of the armed provocation perpetrated by the south Korean forces on Nov. 10, noting that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities drew the illegal "northern limit line" in the West Sea after the ceasefire of the Korean war and have since committed ceaseless military provocations in those controversial waters, seriously threatening the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The DPRK has acquired high technology for a peaceful use of nuclear energy and space and built powerful nuclear deterrent to cope with the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges for aggression, the bulletin said, and continued:
					
					 Its defence capability based on its own science and technology is a brilliant fruition of the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The south Korean military authorities should apologize to the DPRK for the above-said armed provocation.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que se ha aprobado la "resolucion de DDHH" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el tercer comite del 64o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC se entrevisto el dia 20 con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea.
					La reciente farsa de aprobar la "resolucion de DDHH" en el tercer comite de la Asamblea General de la ONU no es mas que una rutinaria intriga politica anti-RPDC en que incurren todos los anos las fuerzas hostiles, senala el portavoz en su respuesta y continua:
					
					Pero, lo insoslayable del caso es que EE.UU. procedio directamente a inventar con fraudes y falsificaciones de toda indole ese documento de bandido, que insulta nuestro regimen y atenta nuestra soberania, incorporando a sus satelites como la Union Europea y Japon.
					
					Esa accion hostil resulta mas ilegal y grosera todavia si se tiene en cuenta que ese documento fue aprobado por la fuerza pese a que tendra lugar en diciembre que viene en el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU la revision regular de la situacion general de DDHH de la RPDC y la abrumadora mayoria de los paises miembros de la ONU, inclusive los paises no alineados, rechazan categoricamente la aprobacion de los proyectos de resolucion de un pais especifico.
					
					Segun un dicho, hay que limpiarse las manos antes de senalar a otros con el indice acusador.
					
					Pero como se atreven a hablar de la situacion de DDHH de otros si EE.UU. perpetra todos los dias los crimenes de violacion de DDHH agrediendo a los paises soberanos bajo el pretexto de la "guerra antiterrorista" y asesinando cruelmente a los habitantes inocentes y los paises occidentales tienen los mismos defectos y males sociales de todo tipo como el maltrato a las minorias y las etnias indigenas, la discriminacion racial, el asesinato y la prostitucion.
					
					Japon tiene que callarse tambien aunque tenga 10 lenguas porque no ha liquidado hasta la fecha sus tremendos crimenes anti-eticos cometidos en el siglo pasado en Corea como el genocidio de mas de un millon de coreanos, el reclutamiento forzoso de mas de 8 millones 400 mil y el reclutamiento de 200 mil coreanas convertidas en esclavas sexuales por concepto de "consoladoras" del ejercito japones.
					
					Como siempre, rechazamos rotunda y totalmente esa "resolucion" fabricada por EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites que se atreven a eliminar la ideologia y el regimen, optados por nuestro pueblo, interviniendo en los asuntos internos bajo el pretexto de la "defensa de DDHH".
					
					Los DDHH son los derechos estatales y estos significan la vida de una nacion.
					
					Sin la garantia de la soberania estatal, no se puede pensar en el disfrute de los verdaderos DDHH ni en su proteccion. Esto es la verdad que muestra la realidad de las relaciones internacionales de hoy.
					
					La Carta de la ONU reconoce el derecho a la autodeterminacion nacional, el de optar y el principio de no intervencion en los asuntos internos.
					
					Ningun pais de este mundo tiene el derecho a imponer al otro el sistema sociopolitico a su estilo ni podra hacerlo nunca.

articles.title: ATCC enumera crimenes de Japon contra movimiento independentista
articles.content:
ATCC enumera crimenes de Japon contra movimiento independentista
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Entre los crimenes cometidos en el pasado por el imperialismo japones para exterminar a la nacion coreana, sobresale la represion de crueldad sin precedente contra el movimiento independentista antijapones del pueblo coreano.
					Perplejos ante el crecimiento del animo antijapones del pueblo coreano con motivo de la invencion en 1905 del "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa", los imperialistas japoneses fabricaron las leyes infames de diversos tipos para mantener y recrudecer su coloniaje.
					
					Ademas, ubicaron a lo largo y estrecho de la extension geografica coreana a los militares, gendarmes y policias que aplastaban barbaramente cualquier movimiento independentista.
					
					El "codigo civil de Corea", el "decreto de procesamiento sumario" y otras leyes inventadas en aquel entonces daban al gendarme y la policia la facultad de ejecutar a sus caprichos a los habitantes patrioticos.
					
					Ademas, bajo el pretexto de que las tropas japonesas estacionadas en Corea eran insuficientes para ejecutar la "operacion punitiva" contra el ejercito voluntario antijapones, llegaron a Corea muchos efectivos de refuerzo provenientes del pais isleno.
					
					Despues de agosto de 1907, esa operacion llego al climax.
					
					Segun las estadisticas publicadas por el imperialismo japones que logicamente han sido reducidas adrede, entre agosto y diciembre de 1907, resultaron asesinados mas de 3 mil 620 voluntarios y habitantes coreanos y en 1908, mas de 11 mil 560.
					
					El peor caso de ello fue la "operacion de cerco y exterminio" llevada a cabo en aquel periodo contra los voluntarios que luchaban en la provincia de Jolla.
					
					En noviembre de 1910, la "operacion punitiva" de gran envergadura se escenifico tambien en las provincias de Hwanghae, de Hamgyong y de Kyongsang dejando como saldo muchos voluntarios y habitantes matados. 
					
					En diciembre del mismo ano, el imperialismo japones invento el "caso del atentado contra la vida de Terauchi", que fue utilizado como pretexto para detener a mas de 600 patriotas coreanos y encarcelar a mas de cien, que en su mayoria resultaron muertos.
					
					El numero de los detenidos y encarcelados en virtud del "derecho a la ejecucion forzada" y del "derecho a la ejecucion sumaria" crecio en mas de 10 veces en 1918 en comparacion con la cifra de 1912.
					
					Aunque pase mucho tiempo, el pueblo coreano ajustara sin falta la cuenta de tales crimenes tan horribles del imperialismo japones.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun senala la maxima de la era de reunificacion de 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun senala la maxima de la era de reunificacion de 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar han aprendido en carne propia la leccion y la verdad, sacadas de su historia nacional, de que la unidad es la victoria y la dispersion significa la derrota.
					Por lo tanto, luchan hoy dinamicamente tomando como maxima de la epoca el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" que permite abrir la nueva era de reunificacion independiente y prosperidad nacional.
					
					Senala asi el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido el dia 21 y continua:
					
					Ese ideal sirve de poderosa fuente ideo-espiritual que hace a todos los coreanos alzarse bien convencidos de su victoria al cumplimiento de la causa patriotica de la reunificacion.
					
					El se fundamenta en la idea de autodeterminacion nacional de solucionar los asuntos nacionales con las fuerzas propias.
					
					Ademas, esta caracterizado por la firme voluntad de todos los coreanos de marchar unidos superando las diferencias de ideas, sistemas, religiones y criterios politicos y teniendo el orgullo de la superioridad de su nacion y el verdadero concepto de los connacionales.
					
					Al poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu independiente y el poderio de la unidad de los integrantes de la nacion, el ideal en cuestion hace a todos los connacionales odiar a las fuerzas foraneas que pisotean la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion, rechazar el servilismo y dependencia de las grandes potencias y emprender la senda por la reunificacion independiente de la nacion.
					
					Durante casi 10 anos que datan de la presentacion de ese ideal, se elevo aun mas la conciencia de independencia nacional entre los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais y se hace cada vez mas calido el entusiasmo por reunificar el pais de manera independiente pese a las pruebas y dificultades que se multiplican debido a las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida y anti-reunificacion de los reaccionarios internos y externos.
					
					Esta realidad patentiza que el citado ideal constituye la verdadera bandera de amor por la patria y la nacion y de reunificacion independiente y es mil veces justo el camino que emprenden los coreanos para cumplir esta causa.
					
					El ideal es la simiente del patriotismo que quema todos los productos de la desconfianza y la confrontacion impuestas por las fuerzas foraneas y la fuente de energias para edificar una potencia reunificada, que sera envidiada por todos, y manifestar a todo el mundo el gallardo aspecto de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Aumento armamentista de los belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Aumento armamentista de los belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 21 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Las fuerzas belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea se aferran con mas frenesi al aumento armamentista contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 En los ultimos tiempos dan acicate a la reestructuracion de las fuerzas armadas en general, al desarrollo de los equipos belicos ultramodernos y a la introduccion de los armamentos desde ultramar, hablando de "adquirir la capacidad del cumplimiento de la guerra independiente".
					
					 El 13 de octubre, anunciaron que construiran 6 destructores de nuevo tipo que se utilizarian como fuerza principal de la unidad naval movil.
					
					 Con anterioridad, las fuerzas terrestres presentaron el plan de desarrollar la aeronave tactica teledirigida y el avion intermediario aereo teledirigido con la capacidad de vigilancia de dia a noche sobre la RPDC y emplazarlos a todos los cuerpos y las divisiones de infanteria.
					
					 En particular, se afanan abiertamente en el aumento armamentista necesario a la operacion de desembarco. 
					
					 Eso es un plan de aumentar el numero de los vehiculos blindados para el desembarco de nuevo tipo y los helicopteros moviles en las marinas con el fin de ampliar la esfera de ofensiva a la profundidad de nuestra parte. 
					
					 Por otra parte, los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea introducen en gran medida desde ultramar los armamentos para cumplir la guerra de agresion al Norte. 
					
					 Segun los datos sobre la exportacion de armamentos a ultramar, publicados por una direccion adjunta al Departamento de Defensa estadounidense, el Sur de Corea compro solo este ano los armamentos de fabricacion norteamericana equivalentes a 716 millones 600 mil de US$. 
					
					 Tales hechos muestran claramente cuan freneticas son las maniobras de las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas encaminadas a provocar de todas maneras una guerra de agresion en la Peninsula Coreana.
